data.author: Jordan Chin

changelog.release_notes: v1.2 - Changed timer modes to 5, 10, and 30 minutes only. Default is 10 minutes. All scores are tracked in score screen throughout app session. Score screen automatically pops up after timer runs out.
v1.1 - Fixed a design flaw where high score was only saved when looking down-button to view score & high score.

v1.0 - Initial release. 
* Start/stop a 10-minute timer that you start when you're about to consume one of the 10-minute glimmer boosters.
* Press select or shake wrist to start timer (so you can quickly consume the booster without taking your hands off the controller).
* At start of timer, app will automatically record your current glimmer level.
* Stop timer early by pressing select (no stoppage using shake motion, just in case you get frustrated during play and shake the controller violently).
* When timer is up, Pebble will "long" vibrate to let you know your glimmer boost is done.
* Pebble will also "double" vibrate at 40s mark to warn you the timer is almost up.
* When timer is stopped, app will automatically record your new glimmer count and show amount earned. 
* Will record highest amount of glimmer earned during timer run. 
* Configurable timer mode from 10-60 mins. Change mode by pressing up-button when timer is stopped.
* Press down-button to load "score" and "high score".

data.description:
Homebrewed Pebble app to monitor your Destiny glimmer farming and alert you when your glimmer boosters have become inactive. Track your best glimmer runs!

(This app leverages some code from another Destiny app: Destiny Pebble Tracker by AK Studio. If you like Destiny Glimmer Farmer, please consider checking out their app as well!)
